name: Chibi Market
description:
Chibi Market is a short adventure about trading items!

Everyone gets what they want and everyone wins.

Game, art, code and music made in 48 hours for StartupCities Game Jam..

How to play

WASD — walk

E — trade items

Q — view grocery list

Your goal: collect all items from your grocery list. Made by Team TUC:

uma waratte — game designer, 2D artist, teamlead (itch, discord: Utti#7463) 
Grihska_17 — 3D artist, programmer (itch) 
Veronika Moskalevets — sound designer (tg: kosheynik)
Maria_So — 3D / 2D artist (inst: maria_so_art, vk)
Radomir — 3D artist
Yan — programmer

Assets used:

Mixamo for animation
